comments.comment: For any of the backers reading the comments section, there is more up to date information on the Facebook group called "Longer Nano Duo Official Group"
There is a live stream tomorrow and a letter from the CEO of Longer was posted there today
Is the Freight charge the same for both size enclosures?
Hi lgrip, yes, the shipping cost is the same.

You have now posted information on the Larger enclosure. To change my order from the smaller enclosure to the larger enclose, do I need to cancel my order and enter a new order with the larger enclosure?
Hello lgrip, you can select "Manage your pledge" and then select "Change your pledge" to change your order information. Thank you for your support!
@Longer do you currently sell or ever plan to sell replacement lenses for these lasers AND do you plan to sell lenses with different focal length, like a 300mm lens vs the 160mm lens it comes with?

Hello! Currently, we do not sell replacement lenses for our lasers, but we are exploring the possibility of offering replacement lenses in the future. We will notify you when there is an update. Thank you for your support!
Okay, Thanks
Really interested on it too
Hello, I'm a little unsure whether there will be software for the machine when it arrives or if I have to get one? If I have to get one, will the AI function appear within it? thanks
Their laser burn software which comes with the machine has all the AI functionality in it
Hello Robert Gemesi! Nano Duo will come with our software LaserBurn with AI function. Thank you for your support.
Thx
Are there any videos or demos showcasing how the enclosure and smoke purifier work? I’m particularly interested in their safety, performance and noise levels.
Will enclosure work with dual axis? Let me know. Thanks!
@Longer, I have the same questions.
We want more product information about the add-ons
For the laser enclosure, will it be large enough to hold more than just the Nano Duo, for example will it fit the Nano Duo with the dual axis extension or when using the 4th axis or conveyor?

For anyone following along I was just told the dual access won't work with the enclosure by some other person from Longer on the Facebook group, I'd say at this point I'd only expect the laser to fit and if you wanted it for housing the accessories I'd not order it.
This is really frustrating Longer please sort this out and update the campaign page
Hello Zzz,

Thank you for your patience and understanding! We apologize for any confusion caused by the previous information. This week, we will update the campaign page to offer two sizes of enclosures and clearly indicate the size and whether it can accommodate accessories. This will help you choose the size that best suits your needs.
Thank you for your support!
Okay the sooner the better, also are the same people who are responsible for answering these comments the same as that are responding to comments on the Longer Nano Duo facebook group?

Can both lasers be used at the same time? Saw a YT clip where a guy used an F1 ultra this trick to warm up stainless steel with the red laser as he phrased it and then engraved it with the blue one. This apparently created a much better end result
That sounds interesting, got a link for the video?
Just had a look, can’t find it again. I try searching again tomorrow
Hello Wouter Vissers, Nano Duo cannot use two lasers at the same time, but can be switched during the engraving process. Thank you for your support!
Very excited about this! How small can you engrave with the rotary extension? Can you engrave rings?
Hello TanRu! Absolutely, you can engrave the ring! The engraving diameter range for the rotary extension is from 3mm to 150mm. Thank you for your support!
Oh great! Is there anywhere we can see that in action? My youtube searching has pretty much only turned up water bottles.
https://www.facebook.com/share/v/1ERfaPdzy1/ that's the only one I'm aware of
I’m a beginner unfortunately the ruby is just within my budget, I know I’m limiting what I can possibly do.

Hello Alexander M Haney! It's completely understandable to work within a budget, and starting with a ruby is a great choice. It can still provide you with plenty of opportunities to explore and create. Remember, every expert was once a beginner, and the experience you gain now will be invaluable as you progress! Thank you for your support!
What version of Lightburn software do you recommend for the Longer Nano Duo?
Hello lgrip, Longer Nano Duo requires the Gcode version of Lightburn software. Thank you for your support!

The portability, the price, the features, the expandability, they're all great, but what I like the most about the Nano Duo is the AI positioning. Hopefully it means no more guesswork, and accurate placing of the engraving every time. Combined with the conveyor belt, it should make engraving promotional items much faster than with just about every other laser engraver out there, especially at this price point.
My favorite features are the price-quality ratio for such a powerful double laser and the AI functions which will make my life easier for mass production.
I really like the portability and the felxability, so anything can be engraved everywhere. I can also Engrave my 3D Prints in the future to personalise them.
Hello Longer, please give us backers an update about production! last one was 29 days ago. Is everyting OK?
Hello Willem van Zanten,
Thank you for your concern and patience! I'm pleased to inform you that everything is proceeding smoothly.

Our production is on track, and the team is dedicated to ensuring that every detail meets the highest standards. We will be sharing more updates in the coming weeks to keep you informed of our progress.
We truly appreciate your support and understanding! If you have any further questions or need more information, please don’t hesitate to reach out.

My favorite features of the Nano Duo are 2 laser power on a single device, auto focus and fill pattern! With 2 laser power on a single device, I can laser different types of materials seamlessly and on the fly! With the auto focus & fill pattern, I don't have to keep adjusting my laser module to focus on different types of materials. This make laser engraving/cutting so much easier, effective and efficient!

The two features that I'm most excited about it using the Camera / AI to assest with getting the design properly centered on the blanks. And the second thing I'm excited for is the Conveyer Belt. So if I want to make a large batch of identical key chains I can put them on the best and the Longer Nano Duo will make sure everything is done with minimal effort.
I like very much the enormous possibilities of the dual Laser and the complete Bundle, I hope it will bring my business forward.
I really like the portability with the ability to extend work area
It has become quite calm here. No more Updates, no more infos since several days. Whats up Longer? Everything ok?

For me the possibility to "engrave" 3D printed parts by colour change and not melting the surface with the IR Laser is a very interesting possibility. That's a good feature to put my brand on parts additional to multicolour printing.

ZWill the AI feature come to the iOS app too? There are many M1 or higher iPads now, not to mention many capable iPhones too that should easily be able to run that feature. Quite disappointing to see it’s not added to the app atm. Worst case, bring out a secondary app only for those devices that are capable of running it. There are many games or other heavy-duty apps that are exclusive to certain hardware tiers, so it wouldn’t be a stretch to create an AI-focused version for supported devices.
Hello Wouter Vissers! Yes, AI functions will appear in iOS applications. Currently, the APP with AI program is in optimization testing and will be launched soon. Thank you for your support！
Will the conveyor be able to engrave longer items like the ultra machine from one of your competitors? Or will only the extension-bed allow for larger engravings?
Will embossing be able wile using the convayor?

Hello Wouter Vissers! The conveyor can handle longer items and is not limited to its own length. As for embossing, it can also be done while using the conveyor, depending on the specific setup and materials used. If you have any more questions or need further clarification, feel free to ask! Thank you for your support！

I’m new to lasers…I want to engrave photos on 4x4-inch slate or tile. Realistically, how long would it take to do that with the Nano Duo galvo laser? I'm looking for times under 1 minute—preferably around 30 seconds. If this model can’t do it, which one can? Which laser beam (Diode or IR) would be used to achieve this? What hard materials (other than paper) can I use for detailed 30-second or 1-minute photo engravings with your laser or similar lasers? I want a quick, one-pass, permanent surface mark with high contrast. I am not necessarily trying to achieve very deep engraving for this project. I'm open to using coated or anodized aluminum to enhance speed and vibrancy. I plan to do engravings on-site, so I prioritize portability and speed over achieving the absolute highest quality. I have backed the Nano Duo along with all of the available accessories.

Hello David Hardy! The Nano Duo galvo laser can engrave photos on 4x4-inch slate or tile, but achieving engraving times under 1 minute—especially around 30 seconds—may be challenging, depending on the complexity of the image and the settings used. For hard materials like slate or tile, an infrared laser is preferred, as it provides better contrast and speed than diode lasers. If you have any other questions or need further guidance, feel free to reach out! Thank you for your support!

I have one laser but a large frame and inaccuracy in work, constant calibration forced me to look for something better. I found the perfect tool! You put it on the table and work! in addition AI gives unlimited possibilities! I already know that with Longer Nano Duo I will create something great!
I have a glowforge pro and these are se of the problems I had with it, hoping these will be rectified with this purchase
